description: This walk visits the village of Burythorpe, North Yorkshire. The pretty rural village is located just south of Malton and includes a noteworthy 19th century church. This short circular walk takes you through the village and past the Grade II listed church with some fine views of the Yorkshire Wolds countryside. To continue your walking in the area head west to visit the historic Kirkham Abbey. There's some lovely grounds, River Derwent views and fine gothic architecture to enjoy at the 12th century abbey site. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Burythorpe. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
